entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
